featured.text: As 19.(A) who (B) while (C) that (D) when 20.(A) relieved (B) relaxed (C) relied (D) reacted European politicians are trying to get the UK Government to make cigarette companies print photos on the packets.

definition.zh_def: 從事政治活動的人，尤其是選舉產生的公職人員。
definition.en_def: A person who is involved in politics, especially one holding or seeking an elected office.
definition.example: The politician gave a speech about the importance of community service.
